org.event
Class Reflex

java.lang.Object
  org.event.Reflex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reflexive
public class Reflex
extends Object
implements Reflexive

Response to a stimulus.

Encapsulates a fast or slow response. Slow response is run on a separate thread from threadpool.

Constructor Summary

          Create reflex from static method.

          Create a reflex from instance method.

Method Detail

speed

public Reflex speed(String speed)
Tell reflex speed (fast / slow).

A fast reflex is invoked synchronously, slow reflex - asynchronously.

Parameters:
speed - speed of reflex
Returns:
reflex for chaining

speed

public String speed()
Get reflex speed (fast / slow).

A fast reflex is invoked synchronously, slow reflex - asynchronously.

Returns:
speed of reflex
